org.wildfly.security.ssl

Class ServerSSLContextBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wildfly.security.ssl.ServerSSLContextBuilder

  • public final class ServerSSLContextBuilder
extends Object
    A class which allows building and configuration of a single server-side SSL context. The builder requires, at a minimum, that a key manager be set; all other parameters have default values as follows:
    • The security domain defaults to being empty (no client authentication possible)
    • The evidence decoder defaults to the X.509 decoder
    • The principal decoder defaults to the default principal decoder
    • The cipher suite selector defaults to CipherSuiteSelector.openSslDefault()
    • The protocol suite selector defaults to ProtocolSelector.DEFAULT_SELECTOR
    • The "require client authentication" flag defaults to false
    • The provider supplier defaults to Security::getProviders
    Author:
    David M. Lloyd

        Set the security domain to use to authenticate clients.
        Parameters:
        securityDomain - the security domain to use to authenticate clients, or null to disable client certificate authentication

        public ServerSSLContextBuilder setEvidenceDecoder(EvidenceDecoder evidenceDecoder)
        Set the evidence decoder. This is the decoder used to get the principal from the client certificate.

        evidenceDecoder - the evidence decoder
